        current_char = letters(i_char)

        if ( INDEX(s_line, current_char) ==0 ) cycle

program main

    implicit none
    character(len=200000) :: s, t
    integer :: pos_char, first_occurrence_s, first_pos, len_s, len_t, i
    logical :: res = .true.
    character(len=1) :: alphabet(26), current_char, t_char
    integer, allocatable :: s_indices(:), t_indices(:)
    

    ! Initialize alphabet
    alphabet = [ (char(ichar('a') + i), i=0,25) ]

    read(*, '(A)') s
    read(*, '(A)') t

    len_s = len_trim(s)
    len_t = len_trim(t)
    
    if ( len_s /= len_t ) then 
        print *, 'No'
        stop
    end if
    
    do i = 1, 26
        current_char = alphabet(i)
        
        first_occurrence_s = INDEX(s, current_char) 
        if (first_occurrence_s == 0) cycle ! Character not found, skip
        
        t_char = t(first_occurrence_s:first_occurrence_s)
        
        ! Collect indices of current_char in S and t_char in T
        call collect_indices(s, current_char, s_indices)
        call collect_indices(t, t_char, t_indices)
        
        if ( size(s_indices) /= size(t_indices) ) then
            res = .false.
            exit
        end if
        
        ! Check if all indices match
        if (any(s_indices .ne. t_indices)) then
            res = .false.
            exit
        end if
        
        deallocate(s_indices)
        deallocate(t_indices)
    end do
    
    if (res) then 
        print *, 'Yes'
    else
        print *, 'No'
    end if
    
contains

subroutine collect_indices(str, target_char, indices)
    character(len=*), intent(in) :: str, target_char
    integer, allocatable, intent(out) :: indices(:)
    integer :: n, i
    
    n = 0
    do i = 1, len_trim(str)
        if ( str(i:i) == target_char ) n = n + 1
    end do
    
    allocate(indices(n))
    
    indices = 0  ! Initialize, maybe not needed
    
    integer :: count = 0
    do i = 1, len_trim(str)
        if ( str(i:i) == target_char ) then
            count = count + 1
            indices(count) = i
        end if
    end do
end subroutine
    
end program main
